segments.text: Welcome to the National Post . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I would like to send this package to China , and these postcards as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . You will need some stamps for the postcards and I need to weigh that package .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is this going to cost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it depends . Do you want to send it via priority , express or standard mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , standard mail can take up to fifteen working days . Priority is a bit faster and will arrive in about five to eight working days . Express is the fastest , but it ’ s also the most expensive . It only takes three days and you can track your package online .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Well , there ’ s no rush . Please send it via priority mail . Please be extra careful , the contents of the package are fragile .
segments.speaker: S2
